Bash(__NEW_LINE_9eafe2e6908754df__ echo "=== Test 4a: Firewall page should load ===")

Bash(# Create test with long target sudo iptables -t filter -N LONGTARGETTEST sudo iptables -t filter -A INPUT -p tcp --dport 8888 -j LONGTARGETTEST # Fetch and check the span element curl -s -b /tmp/cookies.txt ""http://localhost:8090/firewall?table=filter&chain=INPUT"" grep ""LONGTARGETTEST"" /tmp/target_test.html)

Bash(# Test with a chain name longer than 10 characters sudo iptables -t filter -N VERYLONGCHAINNAME sudo iptables -t filter -A INPUT -p icmp -j VERYLONGCHAINNAME echo ""=== Target cell with long name ==="" curl -s -b /tmp/cookies.txt ""http://localhost:8090/firewall?table=filter&chain=INPUT"")

Bash(# Create test and check full output sudo iptables -t filter -N EXTRALONGNAME sudo iptables -t filter -A INPUT -p tcp --dport 7777 -j EXTRALONGNAME # Get the full Target td element curl -s -b /tmp/cookies.txt ""http://localhost:8090/firewall?table=filter&chain=INPUT"")
